sun.title: Project Core: Interactive Portfolio
sun.subtext: An immersive, space-themed portfolio built from the ground up with vanilla JavaScript.
sun.body: This portfolio is a testament to the power of foundational web technologies. The entire experience, from the procedurally generated galaxy to the cinematic transitions and interactive solar systems, is rendered on the HTML5 Canvas. The architecture is built around a robust, state-driven application controller that manages different views and transitions seamlessly.

planets.name: Architecture
planets.title: Architecture & State Management
planets.body: The application is driven by a central state machine in main.js (Controller). Project and content data is decoupled into JSON files (Model), allowing for easy updates without touching the logic. Visual components are encapsulated into classes like GalaxyView and SolarSystemView (View), ensuring a clean separation of concerns.

planets.name: Visuals
planets.title: Generative & Procedural Visuals
planets.subtext: Creating a unique, dynamic experience with code.
planets.body: The galaxy is not a static image; it's procedurally generated using multiple layers of particles distributed along mathematical spirals. This creates a 2.5D parallax effect that gives the scene a sense of depth and life. The hyperspeed transition is also a self-contained, perpetual particle system designed for a smooth, cinematic feel.
